description.name: Joker.com
description.tagline: A leading ICANN-accredited registrar and domain resale provider.
description.long: Joker.com is in the registrar business since 1997, effectively being one of the first registrars ever. This also shows - we are quite a pioneer in this area, and gained great experience in registering domains. We also became ICANN accredited soon in 2001, and successfully provided domain names since then.
